title: Refiberd scores $200k PDS Ventures investment on GFA Trailblazer win
body: Refiberd has been named the recipient of the Global Fashion Agenda Trailblazer Programme 2025 award, securing an investment of up to $200,000 from PDS Ventures.

title: Refiberd Wins Trailblazer 2025 With AI-Powered Textile Recycling
body: AI-powered textile recycling startup Refiberd won the Global Fashion Agenda's second Trailblazer Programme award.
